name: Chicken Chop
description:
Originally published 2019. My first ever published game, though the google play listing is long gone now.

Also yes, this is where my pfp comes from.

Swing your mace and brutally destroy some chickens in this fast paced, gory, and addictive retro styled action game! Simple one-touch controls and easy-to-follow tutorial make learning the game a breeze, but mastering the art of murdering chickens an epic yet exciting task.
